summary: It doesn't work. It just shows icon and then disappears immediately

description: I run the wireguard service on a pi . I use both Windows and Linux. It was easy to get it working on Kubuntu with; sudo apt install wireguard and using the wireguard-gui to configure the client. The only issue I have is that the application won't launch from the application menu. However, it will lauch from Discovery if you select the application and then press Launch on the top right of the window.
I try to open the app, but it's close automaticaly.

I checked that I had installed wireguard, which I did. But when I enter a configuration that works if I go through another wireguard-gui. The connection doesn't work. I don't know if I've forgotten something or not.
I'm on Debian 12.5 and I installed it via the Snap application library.
